skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.

skills.desc: Reflects 60% of the damage taken back to the attacker. DEF increases by 15% for each dead ally.
skills.name: Standstill [Passive]
